education_text.0: Sergey Mikhailovich Brin was born on August 21, 1973, in Moscow in the      Soviet Union Soviet Union,          to      History of the Jews in Russia Russian Jewish parents,          Mikhail and Eugenia Brin, both graduates of      Moscow State University Moscow State University (MSU)The Brin family lived in      Vienna and Paris while Mikhail Brin secured a teaching position at the      redirect    University of Maryland University of Maryland with help from      Anatole Katok Anatole KatokThe Brin family lived in      Vienna and Paris while Mikhail Brin secured a teaching position at the      redirect    University of Maryland University of Maryland with help from      Anatole Katok Anatole KatokBrin attended elementary school at Paint Branch      Montessori education Montessori School in      Adelphi, Maryland Adelphi, Maryland, but he received further education at homeBrin began his graduate study in computer science at      Stanford University Stanford University on a   During an orientation for new students at Stanford, he met      Larry Page Larry PageBrin is a backer of LTA Research
